item.title: Driver kills 10 by ramming truck into New Orleans crowd in New Year attack
item.description: "This man was trying to run over as many people as he could," Police Chief Anne Kirkpatrick said at a televised press conference on Wednesday.

item.title: The battered bond market starts 2025 facing some difficult issues about debt
item.description: Investors face multiple challenges in the year ahead, including one under-the-radar worry about short term notes coming due.

item.title: These restaurant chains closed locations in 2024
item.description: Wendy's, Applebee's and Red Lobster were among the chains that announced restaurant closures in 2024.

item.title: Jeju Air plane crash raises questions about concrete wall at the end of the runway
item.description: Some aviation experts say the damage could have been minimized had the plane not collided with the concrete wall.

item.title: Military appeals court lets 9/11 plea deals proceed after defense secretary moves to rescind them
item.description: The U.S. Court of Military Commission Review rejected Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin's attempt to unravel plea agreements with three 9/11 defendants.
